column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I had a chance to eat at Lou Malnati's when I was traveling to Chicago. Overall I liked the pizza. I didn't get the "wow" factor on first bite
column2: but I appreciated more after having several more bites. The sauce is not too tangy
column3: the crust was buttery and cheese and sausages were generously spread over the pizza. Would recommend to anyone visiting Chicago.
